explanation_en: Umareshwar Rai was a prominent Rajput ruler who ruled over the erst Mughal empire.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Chhattrala dynasty?
explanation_en: Pratap Dev was the founder of Chittor dynasty.
